casebody.data:
Tyrone Robinson
v.
Commissioner of Correction Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2016

David B. Bachman, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Tyrone Robinson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn. App. 809, 144 A.3d 493 (2016), is denied.
